title: Freshers
content: Does this college not know that freshers and ethnic day exists. Every other college is having and people are getting mad fomo. You seniors never hsd it as well eh??

comments.body: Welcome to pes ðŸ¥¶ . Soon you'll be getting an email from VC

The one they consistently send every year without changing a word xD
And even atmatrisha is nothing special compared to other college fests
Hehehe lmfao... How did u even have such expectations
Well guess what i am in the ec campus lmao....noice campus life
OP actually thinks the concept of college life exists here ðŸ’€
I feel the same lol. What I've heard and what I'm feeling here is different.

Lol 
Firstly,welcome.

all those rich kiddos populating the campus and still no fresher's?
